workflow_rationale: Adding new mobile device support capability to existing desktop-optimized application. Requires implementing responsive layouts, touch interactions, and performance optimizations without changing core functionality.

phases.name: Mobile Infrastructure Foundation
phases.description: Configure viewport, Tailwind mobile breakpoints, touch utilities, and code splitting

subtasks.description: Verify viewport meta tag exists in index.html
subtasks.notes: Verification passed. Viewport meta tag exists in app/index.html with correct configuration: width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0

subtasks.description: Add mobile breakpoints and touch utilities to index.css @theme block
subtasks.notes: Added mobile breakpoints (sm: 640px, md: 768px, lg: 1024px, xl: 1280px, 2xl: 1536px) and touch utilities (touch-target: 2.75rem, safe-area-insets) to @theme inline block in index.css. Verification passed.

subtasks.description: Configure Vite code splitting for bundles >30kb

verification.command: npm run build && ls -lh app/dist/assets/*.js | wc -l

subtasks.notes: Successfully configured Vite code splitting with manualChunks strategy. Build creates 3 separate JS chunks: main app code, React vendor bundle, and other vendor dependencies. Added tinybase dependency needed for build to succeed. Verification passed: multiple JS chunks created as expected.

phases.name: Core Layout & Navigation
phases.description: Make Shell header and App grid layouts mobile-responsive

subtasks.description: Make Shell header responsive with mobile padding

checks: Logo and title fit without truncation

subtasks.notes: Updated Shell.tsx header and main padding to be responsive: px-4 on mobile, md:px-6 on medium+ screens. This ensures proper rendering at 375px viewport without horizontal scroll.

subtasks.description: Convert App.tsx grid layouts to mobile-first stacking

checks: Compose tab stacks vertically on mobile (375px)
Analytics grid becomes single column on mobile
Layouts expand to 2 columns on lg breakpoint (1024px)

subtasks.notes: App.tsx grid layouts were already correctly implemented with mobile-first responsive classes. Both Compose and Analytics grids use grid-cols-1 (mobile stacking) expanding to lg:grid-cols-2 (2 columns at 1024px). Verified against pattern in TemplateGrid.tsx and all verification requirements are met.

phases.name: UI Primitives Touch Optimization
phases.description: Update button, toggle, and tabs components for 44x44px touch targets and active states

subtasks.description: Increase button size variants to meet 44x44px minimum
subtasks.notes: Updated button size variants to meet 44x44px minimum touch target. Default buttons now use h-11 (44px), sm uses h-9 (36px), lg uses h-12 (48px). Icon buttons updated accordingly: icon=size-11, icon-sm=size-9, icon-lg=size-12. Verification passed.

subtasks.description: Add active states and increase touch targets in toggle.tsx
subtasks.notes: Added active:scale-[0.98] for touch feedback, increased touch targets to match button.tsx (h-11/h-9/h-12 for default/sm/lg), and updated transition to transition-all. Verification passed successfully.

subtasks.description: Make tabs scrollable and increase touch height

checks: Tabs scroll horizontally if needed on narrow viewport

subtasks.notes: Increased TabsList height from h-9 (36px) to h-11 (44px) for touch-friendly targets. Added overflow-x-auto to TabsList for horizontal scrolling on narrow viewports. TabsTrigger already had whitespace-nowrap and active state styling. Implementation follows pattern from TemplateGrid.tsx.

subtasks.description: Add horizontal scroll and touch spacing to toggle-group.tsx

checks: Category toggles scroll horizontally on mobile

subtasks.notes: Added horizontal scroll support and touch spacing to toggle-group.tsx. Implemented whitespace-nowrap for horizontal scrolling, min-h-[44px] for proper touch targets, and gap-1 default spacing for touch target separation.

phases.name: Scorer Components Mobile Optimization
phases.description: Optimize tweet input, media toggles, score display, and suggestions for mobile

subtasks.description: Optimize TweetInput buttons for touch and mobile keyboard

checks: Copy and Clear buttons are touch-friendly
Textarea doesn't get hidden by mobile keyboard
Button row stacks or stays visible on small screens

subtasks.notes: Optimized TweetInput for mobile: changed buttons to default size (44px) for touch-friendly targets, implemented responsive layout that stacks on mobile, added touch-manipulation to textarea, and improved spacing to prevent mobile keyboard overlap

checks: Toggles respond to touch with visual feedback

subtasks.notes:
✅ MediaToggles now meet 44x44px touch targets with adequate spacing:
- Added spacing={8} to ToggleGroup for 8px gap between items
- Applied min-w-[44px] min-h-[44px] to all toggle components
- Prevents accidental adjacent activations
- Follows WCAG 2.5.5 guidelines for touch target sizing
- Application verified running on http://localhost:5181
- Changes committed successfully

subtasks.description: Ensure ScoreDisplay and ScoreBreakdown stack properly on mobile
subtasks.notes: Optimized ScoreDisplay and ScoreBreakdown for mobile with responsive sizing (circle w-24 sm:w-32, text text-3xl sm:text-4xl, padding pt-4 sm:pt-6), added gap spacing, truncation for labels, and shrink-0 classes to prevent layout issues. App builds and loads successfully on port 5181.

subtasks.description: Fix SuggestionList card layout for narrow viewports

checks: Suggestion cards stack vertically on mobile

subtasks.notes: Fixed SuggestionList card layout for narrow viewports with responsive Tailwind classes: flex-col on mobile (stacks badge on top), flex-row on sm+ (side-by-side), reduced padding/gaps on mobile (p-2/gap-2 vs p-3/gap-3), added break-words for text wrapping, and w-full for proper mobile width. Follows patterns from TemplateGrid.tsx.

phases.name: Templates Components Mobile Optimization
phases.description: Optimize template grid, cards, and category filters for mobile touch interaction

subtasks.description: Convert TemplateGrid to single-column mobile layout

checks: Template cards stack as single column on mobile
Grid expands to multi-column on tablet/desktop

subtasks.notes: TemplateGrid already has mobile-responsive layout: single-column on mobile (grid-cols-1), 2 columns on tablet (md:grid-cols-2), 3 columns on desktop (lg:grid-cols-3). Category toggles have horizontal scrolling (overflow-x-auto). All verification criteria met.

subtasks.description: Add touch targets and pressed states to TemplateCard

checks: Template cards respond to touch with visual feedback
Cards are large enough to tap easily

subtasks.notes: Added touch targets and pressed states to TemplateCard: active states (border-primary, scale-0.98), min-h-120px for adequate touch target size, touch-manipulation class, mobile-friendly button visibility, keyboard accessibility, and smooth transitions

verification_strategy.reasoning: High-risk cross-cutting UI change requires comprehensive validation. Manual testing critical due to touch interaction and cross-browser mobile differences. E2E tests needed to verify responsive behavior across multiple viewport sizes.

unit_tests.notes: Unit tests for responsive CSS are not practical. Manual testing and visual regression checks are more appropriate.

integration_tests.notes: Integration tests for mobile responsiveness require browser automation. Manual testing more efficient for this visual/interaction-focused change.

e2e_tests.notes: E2E tests would require Playwright or Cypress setup which doesn't exist. Manual testing on real devices is prioritized.
